p3 <- df[df$Built == "3.5.1",]

for (x in 1:nrow(p3)) {
  pkg <- p3[x, "Package"]
  n <- sum(df$Package == pkg)
  
  if (n == 1) {
      tryCatch({
        install.packages(p3[x, "Package"])
      }, error = function(e){print(
        paste(p3[x, "Package"], e)
      )})
  } else {
      tryCatch({
        remove.packages(p3[x, "Package"], lib=p3[x, "LibPath"])
      }, error = function(e){print(paste(
        'removed',
        p3[x, "Package"]
      ))})
  }
}

## ggplot2



```{r}
#| echo: true

gg_emp <- emp |>
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = value, colour = series_type)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(
    title = "Victorian unemployment rate", 
    subtitle = paste0("Data from ", format(min(emp$date), "%B %Y")),
    y = "unemployment rate", x = "") 
```


```{r}
#| fig-width: 14
#| fig-height: 5
#| fig-align: center
gg_emp
```


## highcharter



```{r}
#| echo: true
hc_emp <- emp |>
  hchart(hcaes(x = date, y = value, group = series_type), type = "line") |>
  hc_title(text = "Victorian unemployment rate") |>
  hc_subtitle(text = paste0("Data from ", format(min(emp$date), "%B %Y"))) |>
  hc_xAxis(title = list(text = NULL)) |>
  hc_yAxis(title = list(text = "unemployment rate"))
```


```{r}
hc_emp |>
  hc_size(height = 300) |>
  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_ggplot2())
```
